turns.ai_line: Good morning Doctor. I dey feel serious pain for my belle as I chop leftover rice wey don stay for house. I dey also feel like I wan vomit and I dey purge too. Abeg, I need help.
"Doctor, I bin chop the rice around 7 pm yesterday. The pain start to dey worry me around midnight. Na the pain wake me dis early mormor. I still dey feel the pain now, e no wan stop at all."
Doctor, I dey also feel like I wan vomit since o. Plus this running belle wey I get so. I tire for dis kind wahala oh. Wetin you think say dey cause am?
